thread.title: ATL Technology Names David Gens CFO
thread.title_full: ATL Technology Names David Gens CFO - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ATL Technology Names David Gens CFO
text:
ATL Technology
Leading Engineering and Manufacturing Company Gears Up for Rapid Growth; Pro Brings Extensive International and M&A experience
SPRINGVILLE, Utah , Aug. 27, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ATL Technology, a vertically integrated electromechanical contract manufacturer with specialties in single use solutions and turnkey OEM products, has named David Gens CFO of the company. ATL Technology is headquartered In Springville, UT , and owns factories in the U.S., China , and Costa Rica . The company focuses in four main vertical markets: Medical, Automotive, Industrial, and Consumer Electronics.
"I am excited to be joining a seasoned team with a unique approach to the market," said Gens. "In addition, I've been extremely impressed by how ATL's complete solution provides significant value to our partners."
Gens brings 25 years of experience with high-growth companies to this position. Prior to joining ATL Technology, he served as senior financial officer in three of Seattle's fastest growing companies, including RPI, Zango (now Blinkx), and Global Seafoods. As an M&A veteran, he has led more than 20 transactions throughout his career.
Gens received his bachelor's degree in accounting from the University of Delaware and a Master's in Business Administration from the University of Washington .
"Dave's lengthy and successful finance, operations, and administration experience in highly dynamic, international business environments is exactly what we need to rapidly grow our company," said Brad Brown , CEO of ATL Technology. "Moreover, he has crucial transactional experience, which will be required as we look to expand both our product offering and our engineering and manufacturing footprints in various countries around the world."
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/atl-technology-names-david-gens-cfo-300133725.html
